00043 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractValidator {
00044 
00045 
00053         public function loadConfig($gp,$tsConfig) {
00054                 $this->settings = $tsConfig;
00055 
00056                 $flexformValue = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],'required_fields','sMISC');
00057                 if($flexformValue) {
00058                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$flexformValue);
00059                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00060                                 $this->settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.'] = array();
00061                                 $this->settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.']['1'] = "required";
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 $this->gp = $gp;
00066         }
00067 
00074         public function validate(&$errors) {
00075 
00076 
00077                 //no config? validation returns true
00078                 if(!is_array($this->settings['fieldConf.'])) {
00079                         return true;
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 //$disableErrorCheckFields = array();
00083                 if(isset($this->settings['disableErrorCheckFields'])) {
00084                         $disableErrorCheckFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$this->settings['disableErrorCheckFields']);
00085                 }
00086 
00087 
00088                 //foreach configured form field
00089                 foreach($this->settings['fieldConf.'] as $fieldName=>$fieldSettings) {
00090                         $name = str_replace(".","",$fieldName);
00091                                 
00092                         //parse error checks
00093                         if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'])) {
00094                                 $counter = 0;
00095                                 $errorChecks = array();
00096                                 //set required to first position if set
00097                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00098                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00099                                                 if(!strcmp($check,"required") || !strcmp($check,"file_required")) {
00100                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00101                                                         unset($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key]);
00102                                                         $counter++;
00103                                                 }
00104                                         }
00105                                 }
00106 
00107                                 //set other errorChecks
00108                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00109                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00110                                                 $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00111                                                 if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."])) {
00112                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['params'] = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."];
00113                                                 }
00114                                                 $counter++;
00115                                         }
00116                                 }
00117 
00118                                 $checkFailed = "";
00119                                 if(!isset($disableErrorCheckFields) || !in_array($name,$disableErrorCheckFields)) {
00120                                                 
00121                                         //foreach error checks
00122                                         foreach($errorChecks as $check) {
00123                                                 $classNameFix = ucfirst($check['check']);
00124                                                 $errorCheckObject = $this->componentManager->getComponent('F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_'.$classNameFix);
00125                                                 if(!$errorCheckObject) {
00126                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Error check "F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_'.$classNameFix.'" not found!');
00127                                                 }
00128                                                 $checkFailed = $errorCheckObject->check($check,$name,$this->gp);
00129                                                 if(strlen($checkFailed) > 0) {
00130                                                         if(!is_array($errors[$name])) {
00131                                                                 $errors[$name] = array();
00132                                                         }
00133                                                         array_push($errors[$name],$checkFailed);
00134                                                 }
00135                                         }
00136                                 }
00137                         }
00138                 }
00139                 return empty($errors);
00140 
00141         }
00142 
00143 }
